title: Friend in the proccess of being hacked
body: My friend is in the proccess of being hacked and someone is on his account whilst he is at school, they sent me a link to some scam website and are now playing vlad and inting. what do i do? riot support is too slow to stop it.

replies.body:
have him change the passcode ASAP when he has done that, as this nice man above me stated send riot a ticket they will lift any bans put on to the account this happened to me a while ago :)
GLHF :)

You need to have your friend reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the subject "I need help recovering my account" asap! They'll be able to repair any damage done, so no worries about that!
